text: Hassan Joharchi (; 28 July 1968 - 3 February 2017) was an Iranian actor. He began his career in the 1980s. He was known for roles in Oo yek freshteh bood (2005), Shoghe parvaz (2012) and Ensanha (2012). He was born in Tehran. He was married with two children. Joharchi died from a cardiac arrest due to liver disease on 3 February 2017 in Tehran. He was 48. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Iran Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Hassan Joharchi
